parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Full pathname of new sub-assembly document ( see Remarks )

title: IAssemblyDoc.InsertNewAssembly
description: Creates a new virtual sub-assembly and optionally saves it to the specified file.

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Full pathname of new sub-assembly document ( see Remarks )

returns: Error code as defined by swInsertNewAssemblyErrorCode_e
remarks:
If
Tools > Options > System Options > Assemblies > Save new components to external files
is:
selected, then this API creates a virtual sub-assembly and saves it to the file specified in FileName.
not selected, then this API ignores FileName, does not save the sub-assembly, and creates only a virtual sub-assembly in the FeatureManager design tree.
